<WG4771> But Thou, <WG1161> Be Sober <WG3525> In <WG1722> All Things, <WG3956> Suffer Hardships, <WG2553> The Work <WG2041> Do <WG4160> Of An Evangelist, <WG2099> <WG3588> <WG1248> Thy Service <WG4675> Fully Carry Out. <WG4135>
<WG1473> For I 1063 CONJ Already 2235 ADV Am Being Poured Out, 4689 V-PPI-1S And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Time 2540 N-NSM 3588 T-GSF 1699 S-1GSF Of My Release 359 N-GSF Is Come. 2186 V-RAI-3S

<WG1214> For Demas <WG1063> Me <WG3165> Forsook, <WG1459> Having Loved <WG25> The <WG3588> Present <WG3568> Age, <WG165> And <WG2532> Is Gone <WG4198> To <WG1519> Thessalonica; <WG2332> Crescens <WG2913> To <WG1519> Galatia, <WG1053> Titus <WG5103> To <WG1519> Dalmatia. <WG1149>
